effect.scarlet_violet: Raises the user’s Special Defense by one stage. If the user uses an electric move next turn, its power will be doubled.
effect.the_teal_mask: Raises the user’s Special Defense by one stage. If the user uses an electric move next turn, its power will be doubled.
effect.the_indigo_disk: Raises the user’s Special Defense by one stage. If the user uses an electric move next turn, its power will be doubled.

short_effect.scarlet_violet: Raises the user’s Special Defense by one stage. User’s Electric moves have doubled power next turn.
short_effect.the_teal_mask: Raises the user’s Special Defense by one stage. User’s Electric moves have doubled power next turn.
short_effect.the_indigo_disk: Raises the user’s Special Defense by one stage. User’s Electric moves have doubled power next turn.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The user becomes charged, boosting the power of the next Electric-type move it uses. This also boosts the user's Sp. Def stat.
